levels.description:
Deals <@ba.vup>{multi_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical Damage <@ba.vup>{multi_times}</> times to an enemy in front. 
<@ba.rem>Lose 1 stack of Talent 2 when skill ends. Can store {cnt}</> charges
